author: wn.com
title: £3.8m EU-backed project to boost job security and career progression in valleys (Welsh Government)
text: ( Source : Welsh Government ) The Working Skills for Adults 2 project, backed by £2.7 million EU funds through the Welsh Government, will help 1,700 individuals gain new skills leading to improved job security and career prospects. Led by
